metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the Wizard1 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This wizard is named Astoundo the Greater.
metadata.how_to_trigger: talk to the wizard1 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Astoundo the Greater
0.text: Behold! The sacred illuminations of the mysterious ancients!

1.speaker: Astoundo the Greater
1.text: Back off, chump, you're too close. Do you want to lose your eyebrows?
